mdRecord.dcterms:title: Drefs' worm syrup
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Charles (Chas.) A. Drefs [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Prepared by Chas. A. Drefs, Apothecary." 2 fluid ounce bottle containing worm syrup for children and adults to treat round, thread, or pin worms; includes instructions in English and German; on the back of the box is an advertisement for Drefs' Gout and Rheumatic Pills.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Pharmaceutical technology--Solutions (Pharmacy)
